title: Devendra Fadnavis gets threat letters over anti-Maoist operations
article_body: MUMBAI: Maharashtra chief minister Devendra has received two allegedly from Maoist organisations which were handed over to the police, sources in the state home department said on Friday. The letters were received by the chief minister's office a week ago, they said. "The letters came after the recent in . The letters have been handed over to the police for further investigations," the sources said. According to the ministry sources, both letters mentioned the encounters, and threatened Fadnavis and his family members.
